ygData.subject: Tinkering skill increase?
ygData.msgSnippet: This may be an odd question, but has anyone SEEN their tinkering skill increase?  I have made like 70 lanterns, 20 compasses, some lockpicks, but have never
ygData.messageBody:
This may be an odd question, but has anyone SEEN their tinkering skill
increase? I have made like 70 lanterns, 20 compasses, some lockpicks, but
have never seen my skill increase like other trade skills. I fact I spent
an hour yesterday just making lanterns. I attempted to make 36 of them
(made like 32), but never say any comments about my skill increasing. Are
we wasting our time on practice?

(Could someone send me a quick Email not as to if they got this message or
not? Not sure if my messages appear in digest mode and want to make sure
I'm getting out to the world ;)

Dass Swiftruner,
Gnome Mage-Tinker (with Blacksmithing and Pottery thrown in for items <g>)
Cazic-Thul
